name: Rsyslog Service
description: Ensures system logging daemon is active.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active rsyslog || echo skip; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service rsyslog status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running && echo active || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart rsyslog || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null; then service rsyslog restart || true; fi
